entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the evening. Wind becoming south 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
